name: 4 in a Row - Board Game Club
name_original: 4 in a Row - Board Game Club
description:
4 in a Row is a challenging board game that is easy to learn but hard to master. The classis is that the player can enjoy as you try to beat the computer or play against a friend. 3 AI levels of gameplay (beginner, expert and master) lets you improve your skill as get fun from this.


Features

* Compatible with iPhone, iPod Touch

* Personalize player name and avatar

* Undo function

* Outstanding 3 AI levels: beginner, expert and master

* Multiple language support: English, Chinese and Japanese

* Score tracking and auto player rank

* Great graphics and awesome sound effects

* Play against a friend or the challenging computer on the same device, or play against a friend on two devices connected via Bluetooth
